name: 餐旅業策略資訊系統管理
description:
As information systems and technologies have become competitive necessity in modern business world, this course is a survey of technology applications, issues, and trends in the hospitality and tourism industry. The role of technology in operations and as a strategic tool to achieve competitive advantage will be examined. Students will need to have a good grasp of how to best implement information systems that will impact the future of their organizations. Current technology issues of interest and importance to the industry will also be explored. Upon the completion of this course, the students should know:

1. Important concepts and theories in management information systems

2. Evaluate and select information technology solutions that will serve business needs and contribute value-adding business benefits

3. Recognize key drivers of technology and innovation

4. Apply the system and technology to enhance customer service experience
goals: Understand the important concepts and theories in management information systems
Evaluate and select information technology solutions that will serve business needs and contribute value-adding business benefits
Recognize key drivers of technology and innovation
Apply the system and technology to enhance customer service experience
syllabus:
As information systems and technologies have become competitive necessity in modern business world, this course is a survey of technology applications, issues, and trends in the hospitality and tourism industry. The role of technology in operations and as a strategic tool to achieve competitive advantage will be examined. Students will need to have a good grasp of how to best implement information systems that will impact the future of their organizations. Current technology issues of interest and importance to the industry will also be explored. Upon the completion of this course, the students should know:

1. Important concepts and theories in management information systems

2. Evaluate and select information technology solutions that will serve business needs and contribute value-adding business benefits

3. Recognize key drivers of technology and innovation

4\. Apply the system and technology to enhance customer service experience

**隨著資訊系統和科技應用在現代商業世界中成為競爭的必需品，本課程是對酒店和旅遊業的科技應用、問題和趨勢的探討。** **將研究資訊科技在運營中的作用，以及作為實現競爭優勢的戰略工具的作用。** **在課程中，學生需要學習掌握如何最好地規畫並實施會影響企業組織未來的策略資訊系統，課程中並將探討當前餐旅業感興趣和重要的科技趨勢。** **完成本課程後，學生應該知道：**

1.  **管理策略資訊系統中的重要概念和理論**
2.  **評估和選擇將滿足業務需求，並能貢獻增值業務收益的資訊技術解決方案**
3.  **識別科技與創新的關鍵驅動因素**
4.  **應用策略資訊系統和應用科技提升客戶服務體驗**

methodologies.note: Lectures on important management information systems theories and concepts, including socio-technical theory, value added analysis, system design approaches.
Two Harvard business cases and three chapter cases will be used to allow the students analyze an organization and discuss the best information system design for the firm.
The students learn how to work in a group setting through the semester project.

A group project is arranged for the students to study a company, identify a challenge or an opportunity the company is facing, and propose an IT-dependent strategic initiative to resolve the issue or create value for the company.

grading.note: There will be 5 business cases throughout the semester. The students have to write up a case report for each case, answering the case questions before participating in the in-class case discussion
The participation of in-class case discussion
Attend the class on time each week, and be prepared to ask and answer questions in the class.
A 30-minute oral presentation of the semester project
